radiographic_examinations.findings: The lung bases are clear aside from basilar atelectasis. The liver enhances homogeneously without focal lesions or intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The gallbladder contains stones but is otherwise unremarkable. The stomach and small bowel are unremarkable without any evidence of wall thickening or obstruction. The colon is unremarkable. The appendix is massively dilated 1.3 cm with a 1 cm clips near the base of the appendix. There is very mild fat stranding posteriorly. No fluid collection. Note is made of a left Morgagni hernia.
